website_summaries.verdict: A canine-pleasing kibble that provides all the nutrients needed for good health. Full of meat, digestible grains, and vegetables.
pros: Includes LifeSource Bits, a blend of vitamins, antioxidants, and minerals
cons: None to speak of, although as with any dog food, it's possible your dog won't care for it

customer_reviews.title: The food is different from the bags in store.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dog, and only feed them Blue Buffal. I noticed someone in the comments saying their dog got sick from the Amazon bag they ordered. And comparing the differences in the coloring of the food compared to neighborhood stores. My dogs haven't got sick but that Amazon bag are shades darker then the store bags. I've also noticed that my dogs don't finish their daily portions like they do when I buy from the store. Amazon I think this is something u should look into.
customer_reviews.author: Tez

customer_reviews.title: Bugs!
customer_reviews.text: Before writing this review I searched for a phone number to contact Amazon directly and could not find one! I just realized this dog food is full of what looks like warehouse beetles from what I've researched, so disgusting! I would like a refund, but cannot find anywhere to submit my claim! They weren't noticeable at first as they are the same color as the food!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Sannizzaro

customer_reviews.title: This food caused both of my beagles to begin panting ...
customer_reviews.text: This food caused both of my beagles to begin panting, increased thirst and urination. Veterinarian directed to stop feeding this product to them and within 24 hours, all symptoms were gone. Something in the food apparently was so "excessive" for my dogs systems, that they both became ill and rapidly. I had to discard the food and a lot of money was lost on both the purchase of this food and our veterinarian bill.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica S.

customer_reviews.title: Worms crawling out of the food on the first day of opening. Disgusting!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened this package there were black hard shelled worms crawling everywhere. It was disgusting and I had to bag up the food and take it to the garbage. I looked up what the pest was and it seems to match the Larder Beetle. I can only hope that these things didn't somehow crawl out of the packaging and into my kitchen while I was waiting to open the bag. My dog likes this food, but not the worms?
customer_reviews.author: Birdy

customer_reviews.title: Rice is not good. It has lots of arsenic.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately rice has lots of arsenic and brown rice even more. I went through three bags of this food in about five months when I realized consumers reports had published that domestic and foreign rice was loaded with arsenic. So I switched to BLUE Freedom Grain Free Dry Dog Food Beef recipe. I skipped the Salmon recipe because farmed salmon is loaded with PCBs, dioxins, dieldrin, and toxaphene.
customer_reviews.author: AL G

customer_reviews.title: Never again.
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. My dogs seem to love it, (this was at first) my 3rd bag came and the food was different, the shape, the smell, and there was so much powder in the bag I had mounds of it. My dogs were having issues eating it. It gave them diarrhea and I stopped feeding it to them. Amazon sent me another bag and it's a little better, but nothing like the first two bags. I have stopped my shipments and went to a different brand. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely best and Healthiest for your Pet.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best dog food for your fur baby. We had a yorkie that had high cholesterol, very bad. We tried Iam’s, Purina, pedigree, eukanuba, hills and beneful. Each of the major dog foods we tried for 3 months and did blood work. Beneful was the worst. They all were bad, very bad. We switched to Blue Buffulo and her blood work came back normal range. We were skeptical so we had blood work done every 3 months for a year and all of her blood work came back normal. Amazing. If you find this review helpful, please click below. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Almost killed my dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying Blue Buffalo off Amazon for years. This last batch put 2 of my 3 dogs in the hospital. (One Chorkie, one pitbull mix). Both dogs separately came down with bloody stools, explosive diarrhea, gas, bloating and vomiting. The pitbull was touch-and-go for a while. After watching carefully and going to a strict chicken/rice diet, both dogs are OK. We tried re-introducing this food to our dogs and immediately got the same response. Never ever buying Blue Buffalo again. This product is either a counterfeit or they’ve drastically changed the quality of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Indian Meal Moth Infestation
customer_reviews.text: I wish the 30lb blue buffalo had a ziplock or a way to firmly close it because once I received my package I soon began getting an insect infestation. I believe my infestation is the Indian Meal Moth. THEY ARE ALL OVER THE LIVING ROOM WHERE I KEEP THE DOG FOOD!! I checked my kitchen and I only saw one or two months but the majority is in my living room!!!!! I'm assuming my packaged came contaminated and now I have to deal with it. Literally just bought fogger to try and get rid of them. HELP PLEASE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Y@ry

customer_reviews.title: Hours of research and found this the best, with.
customer_reviews.text: Premium food. Nice zip lock bag for freshness. It’s important to serve FRESH food!... buy in small quantities. Folks, compare the ingredients with any other dog food and you’ll find this one best. Low cal too. My dog has been on Blue Buffalo Limited Ingredients for six years and her doctor now recommends grain for all dogs. Vet gave supporting documentation from vet schools and universes. Blue Buffalo brand is superior, I’d pay twice the cost. (Don’t tell them.)
customer_reviews.author: The Hoodsie Household

customer_reviews.title: Blue on Blue no more.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a loyal blue customer for a couple years. Believing the PR hype has not be benifical to my show dogs. Only causing bloody,slimy loose stolls & weight gain. As an experienced person of fourty years in owning showing dogs I think I have knowledge of what is good for your dogs & what’s not a good choice. Switched to Purina’s focus. Within a week, stools return to normal. It’s been one month now of Purina’s kibble. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Flanigan

customer_reviews.title: Not okay
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy my dog food off Chewie.com. Well not too happy about this purchase. Upon opening the box dog food spilled all over and bag has a rip on the side. How my supposed to give this to my dogs? How do I know it’s safe? Well I don’t. And it’s not like this food is inexpensive... very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Gave my 10 month old Lab awful diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10-month-old black lab who has survived eating trash and other questionable items on occasion. I had only heard rave reviews and after purchasing an initial bag of Costco brand lamb and brown rice formula I switched to Blue Buffalo. Almost immediately he was having awful diarrhea- the first night it was straight liquid he was straining to get out almost every hour on the hour for 10 hours. The dog food wasn't even on my list of potential reasons and I continued to feedback . A week of straight liquid diarrhea later I finally switched his food over and overnight the diarrhea was gone!!
customer_reviews.author: EquinnwoTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food great price
customer_reviews.text: Great for my variety of adult dogs🐾🐾 they all enjoy it and are sleek and healthy! Great to have it delivered regularly at a fraction of the cost. I also buy cat food on auto ship, do I save even more! Love the product, delivery and pricing! I like being able to buy higher quality food for my rescued furbabies! Rastis - 18 years chihuahua pug mix Mercedes - 15 years chihuahua Darcy - 11 years schnoodle Pie - 6 ish year old rat terrier Sadie - 6/7 year boxer ❤❤❤💸🐾🍖🐩
customer_reviews.author: bluegrasscat

customer_reviews.title: 8 year fan of Blue Buffalo, but beware of sellers!
customer_reviews.text: Blue Buffalo is a great product, but I'm thinking I got an either old or mishandled (overheated) bag. I have ordered this from Amazon for a couple of years, but I should have known something was wrong when my dog who normally inhales kibble turned her nose up at the first bowl from the new bag. Not knowing what was going on, I tried adding things to get her to eat, but nothing. She refused to eat anything from this bag. However, trying a fresh bag from the brick-n-mortar store, at the first dish, she's back to normal. I didn't check the expiration date before I tossed the bag, so my bad. But beware...
customer_reviews.author: James Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: This food did not work for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: Switched to this when the food I was giving my dog was discontinued. Started to notice some changes in his behavior. Sluggish for a normally energetic 6 year old beagle lab mix. Started eating his feces and occasionally throwing up undigested meals. Checked out at Vet including blood work and stool sample. Thankfully he is healthy. Suggestion was made to change food. I got an education on what goes into this food. Switched to a better quality food and the problems are all resolved. Not everyone has had this experience with this food but I wanted to share my observations.
customer_reviews.author: Pia

customer_reviews.title: All natural ingredients, very well priced, and my dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love Blue Buffalo. In the past we have had trouble with my dogs not eating their kibble. They will lick around the kibble or pick out the additions. With Blue Buffalo, they gobble down every bite. All natural ingredients, very well priced, and my dogs love it! Definitely a great purchase in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Curran

customer_reviews.title: Good product -bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: This is the dog food we have been using for our dogs for years. They all seem healthy and enjoy mealtime. Packaging this time was not so good. Bag came in a box exactly twice the size of the large 30 lb. bag with some brown paper packing. It obviously moved around a lot in the box from one end to the other. Paper was pretty much useless. Delivery guy had a hard time getting it to the door, and we had an equally hard time picking it up. Why not just use a smaller box that fits the product? Other than this time, packaging has been good, price is good, and convenience of delivery is good.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling45

customer_reviews.title: The only Food for my Dog!
customer_reviews.text: Wholly cow what a difference. My 13 year old jack/rat terrier seemed to be fading which I thought was just do to his age, a little shaky, week, slow moving, thinning coat, loosing weight that kind of stuff. I started looking into foods for older breads and came across several articles rating dog foods and found out the Purina brand we were feeding him only got a half star for nutrition.(WTF right) So after seeing the ratings for Blue I decided to try it. My little pal is a pup again, beautiful shiny coat, more energy than Iv seen out of him in years, very playful and happy
customer_reviews.author: domesticated14

customer_reviews.title: This may give your dog Montezuma's revenge
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs and I like to change up their food so it's not the same ole same ole. I decided to buy this Blue Buffalo Life Protection Formula because it has quality ingredients but it gave my dogs the runs. To be fair the bag does say to transition your dog over to this food slowly. Well, I didn't read that part until after I noticed the dogs had Montezuma's revenge. This dog food is made with higher quality ingredients than other foods. The dogs seem to like it just fine. Just read the bag before starting off with this or you could be cleaning up some very messy poops.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Moldy dog food.
customer_reviews.text: I have been feeding my dog this variety of Blue Buffalo for 7 years so I am very familiar with the smell and look of the food. Usually I buy from the pet store but not able to get there in time , I decided to purchase from amazon. I was so disappointed to open the bag to be hit with a pungent smell and pieces of mold all through your the bag. I’m not sure whose at fault ( Amazon or Blue Buffalo) as the expiration date is very far off but I will no longer be buying this product from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Salina Williams

customer_reviews.title: The food is great--it's Amazon's delivery that stinks. The ...
customer_reviews.text: The food is great--it's Amazon's delivery that stinks. The bag arrived on time, but when I opened it just now, about a fourth of the bag is nothing but "dust." The food has clearly been handled so roughly that it has disintegrated. I ordered the food (Small Breed Adult--Fish and Brown Rice) online because my Scottish Terrier loves it and my local pet stores don't carry it. But I won't bother again. I'll go straight to PetsMart or Petco and ask them to order it. At least then I will be able to return it if it arrives in the same condition this bag did. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Paige Baker

customer_reviews.title: Used to be my choice in dog food =[
customer_reviews.text: After buying this food for the last year or so, I recently noticed blood in my dogs stool. I've talked to other pet owners and they've recently had similar problems with their dogs and so I've made the connection that the food might be the cause. I stopped feeding him this food and after a trip to the vet and some costly bills I switched him over to core wellness and since then I have seen an improvement in his bowel movements. I'm not sure what's going on with blue buffalo right now, whether it's a product quality issue, or an issue with Amazon. But I don't see myself going back to this brand anymore =/
customer_reviews.author: Captain Planet

customer_reviews.title: LOVE Blue Buffalo Food; NO BHA or BHT Preserevatives in Food; Important!
customer_reviews.text: I received my first 30 pound bag of Blue Buffalo food Saturday and unfortunately, the bag was slit open and food was coming out. I notified Amazon and could not believe that another bag was at my door this afternoon; TWO DAYS LATER and food was in excellent condition!! WOW! That speaks highly to me of the job that Amazon is doing. Service is always great and if something is not right, they DO make it right and I can speak from experience on that. Thanks again Amazon for coming through with food for my pups.
customer_reviews.author: LovVenice

customer_reviews.title: Great food but messy balls
customer_reviews.text: Great food. We switched a few years ago when our 9 yr old vizsla started snubbing her previous food. Tried this and it was night and day. However! The dogs - for some inexplicable reason - drop the tiny black balls everywhere. It drives my wife nuts, which consequently makes me nuts.
customer_reviews.author: AUser102

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR ALLERGIES
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Switched to this dog food because of my dog having severe allergies and after reading the reviews tried the lamb and brown rice as he is allergic to chicken. Within 1 day there was a difference in his itching, dandruff, odor and yeast build up. Combined with Selson Blue for his coat, my dog is 100% better than before. I was how quickly changing his diet helped. I soak his food with some water in a refrigerated container and he liked it even more because its softer and plus I save on budget as this can be expensive. One bag last about 4 months it worth it. Can't recommend any higher.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Kim

customer_reviews.title: After threee years something changed
customer_reviews.text: I had been giving this food to both my labs for years and suddenly they developed chronic diarrhea. After taking them to the the vet and running stool samples my vet determined it was the food. So I switched to Royal Canin upon his recommendation. Her stool became normal and what shocked both my wife and myself is that her shedding changed dramatically. She is much more active and her coat is spectacular. I never though that food could affect a dog so dramatically, but this food was destroying my dogs health.
customer_reviews.author: abb3y

customer_reviews.title: Best ingredients for a high quality dog food
customer_reviews.text: I have fed my dogs exclusively Blue Buffalo for 6 years now. The consistency has been very high and have only had 1 bad bag in those 6 years. Just looking at the ingredients you can tell the time and care put into making sure your dog is getting the maximum amount of nutrition. There are no filler ingredients like you find in other dog foods. The one time I had issues was actually a bag purchased from a brick and mortar store. I have since always subscribed to this product on amazon and ONLY shipped directly from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Dove Family

customer_reviews.title: Bad Batch: Diarrhea Issues!
customer_reviews.text: We had our dog on this food for many years. He does great on it. COVID made purchasing this item online a better option. We bought from this seller for about a half a year with no issues, but this last batch was not good. The dog had diarrhea shortly after eating the new bag. Have to throw the huge bag out. I'm now out $50 and had to do a ton of laundry and carpet cleaning. Not a good experience!
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Switched to Blue Buffalo while trying to figure out if one of my dogs is allergic to chicken. Once she was on 100% Blue Buffalo she was no longer itchy, her fur started looking even better and she stopped smelling so bad. She has more energy and overall is a happier dog. Now all three dogs get Blue Buffalo and all three seem happier and healthier. The stuff I was buying before was almost as expensive as Blue Buffalo but it apparently wasn't near the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Guilmette

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I'm no dog nutritionist, so I can't really speak to ingredient's and the quality. So I'll just have to hope the professional reviews of this product being above average is true. I can speak to my own personal observation. What I've noticed is finally something that my dog seems to enjoy. I knew it from the moment I came in the house with it. Immediate interest. The flavor I think makes all the difference because I tried beef(same co.) before now trying Chicken and Rice. It's been a struggle to find that perfect blend of dry and wet dog food. Well, I feel like I've finally found it. Now to figure out the servings for my ever growing dog. lol
customer_reviews.author: Rico and Family

customer_reviews.title: Buy if you want a gassy dog!
customer_reviews.text: Won’t be buying this again. My dog won’t eat the little black pieces. He takes a mouthful and drops it, then picks out all the brown pieces leaving the black pieces behind. He makes a mess every time he eats. I’m afraid he isn’t getting a nutritionally balanced diet now. And OMG the gas that comes out of him now! He has never been a gassy dog, but ever since I tried this food on him, he clears out the room.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Fischer

customer_reviews.title: bladder issues & my solution
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has some bladder stones and infections. The vet said that blue buffalo dog food can be too high in protein and cause issues with urine Ph... which then causes bladder stones and such. The vet put our dog on a prescription dog food that caused bloody diarrhea. No joke it was AWFUL. It's a long and horrible story but the end result was that finally I took charge and decided to feed our dog 1/2 blue buffalo + 1/2 dog chow. Our dog is happy. She has had no further bladder issues and I'm paying less for dog food. I call that a win-win-win.
customer_reviews.author: monkeymom

customer_reviews.title: STOP & CHECK
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what happened, maybe it's a build up in the system but after about a month on this food, all my dogs got sick, bad diarrhea. after i narrowed it down to this product, i check further and it has a 2 star rating on Food Advisor, i threw it all away! would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Something wrong
customer_reviews.text: This is great food, but there seemed to be something wrong specifically with the food we got from Amazon. Our dog kept getting horrible diarrhea, sometimes mixed with blood. It happened every couple of weeks, and I’m afraid we let him go through a few bags because we’d had good experience with it in the past and it didn’t seem possible that the food was the problem. When an Amazon bag ran out, we bought the same food at our local store, and the problem stopped entirely (that was over six months ago). So we keep on buying it locally. Maybe it’s not being stored properly?
customer_reviews.author: dlee86

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this!
customer_reviews.text: So many people rave about this brand and I don’t recall seeing all these negative reviews before purchasing this. My dogs got very sick from this food! One vomited more than the other. My dogs aren’t sensitive to foods but I always provide them with what’s deemed higher quality foods. I went from Hills Science to this and I immediately regretted trying to save $10/$20. Filter reviews and photos if needed. I absolutely switched foods again and they’re doing so much better. Another less costly (not by much) is Nutro dog food. My dogs love their treats so I’m giving their food a try. So far no issues.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Caused diarrhea in my dogs
customer_reviews.text: After giving this food to both my yellow lab and Jack Russell mix, they both started having loose stools. My vet recommended switching them off BLUE as she had other pet clients who found BLUE too rich for their digestive systems. To use it up I'm mixing it with their old favorite Taste of the Wild kibble and also a chicken/rice/orange squash mixture with a dollop of yogurt. I won't be buying this brand again for my medium-activity dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Tumblewind

customer_reviews.title: Supposed to be high quality food - I agree
customer_reviews.text: My GSD won't eat dry food as is. I have to mix it with "real" fresh food. Mix it all up and she downs the bowl fast. I think this dry food is excellent for dogs and it does have whole grains in it. My vet told me last visit to avoid the grain-free stuff as more reports (and much more recent studies) are showing problems with grain-free foods. I buy this regularly
customer_reviews.author: GrayslakeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Lower quality than same from pet store
customer_reviews.text: This is not equal to the same packaged and labeled product from a pet store. Very few life source bits and turned dog's hair around mouth reddish. Never had that problem from Blue food before.
customer_reviews.author: ERNIE C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for our 50 lb Shepard mix
customer_reviews.text: Our dog developed a food allergy (possibly chicken) and we had to switch her to this food from our previous product. She improved quickly and dramatically. The price is a bit higher but it's worth it to see Gracie NOT chewing on her paws and constantly scratching her ears.... Plus she loves the stuff and is always excited for meal time!
customer_reviews.author: D. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: My dog hates lifesource bits
customer_reviews.text: I like what this brand offers, but my terrier won't eat the lifesource bits. He takes the bits out of his bowl and leaves them all over the floor. He eats the bigger pieces. I don't think he's getting the full benefit of this brand, since the bits contain vitamins. I'll switch back to the one he will eat. I wish the company would coat the bits in something tastier.
customer_reviews.author: sonj

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed. Tried to save myself money
customer_reviews.text: Careful what you ask for. I wasn't sure how soon I'd need my next bag of food since I store it in a sealed bin. Just finally opened the box the bag came in and the bag had a huge hole in it. All the air flew out as I picked it up. Needless to say it's stale! Extremely disappointed. Tried to save myself money, but ended up costing me more since I have to toss this and go buy a fresher bag...
customer_reviews.author: Raine A.

customer_reviews.title: Bad Dog food.....for now...
customer_reviews.text: Where do you get your meat? How long is the shelf life on a bag of dog food? Is it 20 years? If so this is worrisome. I hope one day that D companies making dry dog food and up having some kind of standards on the meat years and the grains the shouldn't be use. Then trying to tell customers that dogs/cats are not carnivores but omnivores...? which is falsification of a specie To fit an agenda. My family is moving to a raul diet after the next purchase of bagged dog food. Unfortunately we cannot afford raul at the moment but we will be moving to it in the future.
customer_reviews.author: TheDisabledBeauty

customer_reviews.title: Best dry dog food for the money and health of dogs
customer_reviews.text: Taste of the Wild was my brand until Blue Buffalo lowered price - and even more if I subscribe for monthly delivery from Amazon. Forget buying it local - way to expensive! The usual brands are crap for animals and are less nutritious. BB is the way to go if you care about the health of your pet. Just do a search for dog food ratings to see what I'm talking about. Dogs eat it fine if I spike it with grated cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Manuele

customer_reviews.title: A win-win!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dogs that are all a little different: A 1 year old Frenchie who has terrible gas. A 2-year old Maltese mix who has tear stain problems, and a 9 year old Chihuahua/dachshund mix that has sensitive skin.... So finding a food that meets all their needs has been a challenge but this brand seems to do the trick and they seem to like the food too.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lee

customer_reviews.title: This is certainly a better food than most the low end stuff in stores
customer_reviews.text: This is certainly a better food than most the low end stuff in stores. my dog spits out the little balls mixed in with the kibble so I get to enjoy picking those up off the floor - I can only assume those little bits taste awful. we are switching to a food that has less carb ingredients and no chicken. she is real itchy and it could be anything causing that but hopefully the switch helps
customer_reviews.author: Cypress

customer_reviews.title: Dog gives this 5 stars, great for subscription
customer_reviews.text: Dog likes this food, but then again, dogs will eat anything, I mean anything. Seriously we have been using blue buffalo for years, now getting this on subscription. Why lug around a heavy bag through the store when you have it delivered right to your home every month, combine with other subscriptions and save even more like kitty litter. After a few months we got a little ahead and had an extra bag, but with amazon subscriptions, it is easy to just to skip a month and get back on schedule.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Golden Retriever Loves It
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old Golden Retriever is not really a picky eater but he does have a sensitive stomach. Based on recommendations I decided to try Blue Buffalo, first purchasing a small bag as a trial. Well he loved it. Better yet he had no difficulty with the new food. I slowly introduced Blue Buffalo into his meals by mixing a small amount with his regular food and then gradually increasing it until it was 100% Blue Buffalo. I've only tried the adult chicken and brown rice so that's the only one I can really recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: My dog thought yuk!
customer_reviews.text: I have feed my dog Blue Buffalo since he was a pup. He refused to eat this, and he is not a fussy eater. Would not eat even when I added sardines and other yummy stuff. I think the bag was bad / stale.
customer_reviews.author: Avril

customer_reviews.title: Boxers LOVE THIS !
customer_reviews.text: After speaking to our vet, he suggested switching from grain free to lamb and rice. We chose Blue and our Boxers are in Love! I seriously regret not using this sooner. We switched from Rachel ray grain free and are not looking back. We have a 3yr old and 6yr old boxer. 3yr old is way happier and they both absolutely love their food! Smells so Fresh when you open the bag. When I “Iron Will” whistle for the dogs, they literally are jumping in circles waiting for their food. 5 Stars
customer_reviews.author: TexasCustomer

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY FINALLY I FOUND THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I have had dogs for many years and have been trying to find the Right Dog Food - and I Finally Found IT! Oh my gosh...I even recently paid a high price and tried unrefined food and my dogs were listless! THIS food is very fresh and actually smells like fish (as it should). I like to add a little warm water to their food and This creates the best gravy yet. My 3 dogs have more energy. We are all very very happy with this dog food. Will try the Lamb Next!
customer_reviews.author: Benyamin Stine

customer_reviews.title: It’s like having a different dog!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog was a little chubby, needing to lose in the neighborhood of 5 lbs to get him to 35 lbs. This food has helped tremendously. We had him on a grain-free blue buffalo before, so we were going to switch anyway (as grain-free has been connected to heart disease). He has lost about 2 lbs over the course of consuming a little over one bag. The real change is in his behavior. He is able to run and jump with more agility. He is so much more playful. He doesn’t get excited to eat like he used to, but I don’t get excited about diet food either.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa C.

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye unexplained fur loss
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this brand and the higher quality ingredients helped to clear up fur loss she was experiencing for unknown reasons. She had oval and circular hair loss patches all over her. The vet tested her for mites and such and after no conclusive evidence, chalked it up to being "normal" in short haired dogs (she is a terrier, pit bull mix). Did some Googling and came up with trying a better brand of food. Tried Blue Buffalo and hair loss cleared up after a month and has never returned (its been about a year and a half). Will stick to this, although it is very expensive (most high quality dog foods are).
customer_reviews.author: helena joyce

customer_reviews.title: This is the second time I have given blue buffalo ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have given blue buffalo a try. This is the second time I have given blue buffalo a try The first time was six years ago when I had a different dog then I do currently In both instances feeding my dogs blue Buffalo food cause them to develop bladder stones and a subsequent large that bill; if you look up online you'll find that there have been thousands of complaints similar to mine
customer_reviews.author: L4ne

customer_reviews.title: Quality Dog Food!
customer_reviews.text: I've been feeding my older dog lamb & rice from Costco (Kirkland), and the Costco brand puppy food for my younger girl. My older girl (Bella) has stomach issues which include periodic loose stools and vomiting. About a month or more ago I changed them to Blue Buffalo chicken and rice formula for adults (Lola is 1-1/2 yrs.). Since the change it seems like both girls are thriving. Bella still has some issues with her stomach where she won't eat in the morning, but episodes of loose stools and vomiting have become much less. It's just a little on the pricey side, but I'll pay it in the hope that my girls will be healthier and live longer.
customer_reviews.author: terrkat

customer_reviews.title: Your pets deserve the quality food that Blue Buffalo provides!
customer_reviews.text: My fur child, Joe, loves Blue food. He has tried many flavors through the years and enjoyed every flavor. His weight is good, his vet checks are excellent. He is a Bernese/Collie mix. I have always fed my dogs and cats quality food. The last five years it has been Blue. Joe will be 20 on his next birthday. He is out playing, really playing, in the snow as I write this. Caring for the nutritional needs of you pets is just as important as that of your human family. I would recommend Blue. You will find the cost well worth the increased quality of life you are providing for all the critters dependent upon your care.
customer_reviews.author: lori johnson

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE QUALITY YOU PAY FOR  AND EXPECT
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was doing my Blue Chow a favor with this high priced brand, I did not realize the company was under so much litigation for poor quality and even deaths from their product, My dog was itching himself constantly I looked for and treated for fleas but that was not the problem.A friend's Bernese Mountain dog was in bad shape from Blue Buffalo and scratching until he bled, The vet took him off BB and he is doing well...That incident rang a bell in my own situation so I took mine off and he is improving. Read some of the other entries on this scam....I wish I had!
customer_reviews.author: D. Piper

customer_reviews.title: Toy Poodle and Multipoo favorite for years
customer_reviews.text: I love the joint supplement small bite size for my two dogs. This is their favorite dog food. Sometimes I buy another brand or flavor and mix into it but oftentimes they turn their noses up at other dog foods. For the price these small bags are about the right amount ensuring that their food is fresh. I believe that dog food over six weeks opened starts to lose its flavor. If I buy the bigger size I break it down into airtight containers to keep longer.
customer_reviews.author: jumper

customer_reviews.title: My dog is in LOVE with Blue Buffalo food!
customer_reviews.text: My dog just LOVES this food. When we first got him, getting him to eat was sort of a struggle. He was super underweight, and come to find out his old owners were feeding him the worst dog food on the planet. He was just pooping it all out every day and hardly getting any nutrients. We tried many different foods, and he is in LOVE with Blue Buffalo. He likes all the flavors he’s tried. He drools waiting to be released to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: 10 years
customer_reviews.text: My little princess has been on this brand/flavor of Blue for 10 years. When she was a puppy she was having allergic reactions to her food and the vet suggested a dog food with lamb and more natural ingredients. I found this and have never looked back....My dog loves it and best of all no reactions!
customer_reviews.author: Jake William

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t read all the reviews because of the overall 4 star rating but after searching fervently for the sudden cause of both of my dogs getting sick I eventually came to the reviews here. My dogs have been eating blue buffalo but this is my first amazon purchase of it and I am done buying anything consumable from them. It was as if the dogs ingested a full colonoscopy prep kit. Hundreds of dollars at the vet later and many many hours of cleanup the nightmare continues. I wouldn’t suggest risking it here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for my dog
customer_reviews.text: This was the brand I got for my dog ever since she was a puppy. She is currently 2.5 years old and probably for the last 6 months or so she started throwing up when eating the dog food. She doesn't do it all the time, but she does do it enough for me to want to stop buying this brand. Also, I don't know if it tastes bad to her but there has been many times where she literally would not eat anything all day, even if the food was just sitting in her bowl. But yeah, unfortunately I have to find another brand for her.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Will continue to buy!
customer_reviews.text: You truly can't go wrong with Blue Buffalo! I've purchased this kind of dog food from them several times now and my dog loves it! Before making the switch to Blue Buffalo, our little guy was dealing with digestive issues and runny bowel movements, not to mention his coat suffered a bit. After we switched, there were no more digestive problems, gross BM's or issues with his coat. Everything cleared up - he's healthy and active. I am a huge fan of any Blue Buffalo product and will continue to buy their dog food and treats. Our dog thanks you!
customer_reviews.author: OllieBear21

customer_reviews.title: the shelter I got him from had recommended some expensive crappy scientific formula food
customer_reviews.text: When I rescued my buddy Jack, the shelter I got him from had recommended some expensive crappy scientific formula food. I definitely wanted to get him the healthiest food possible within a reasonable price range. This fit the bill. I had heard good things about Blue Buffalo and have to agree with everything I have heard. Jack loves this stuff. I have been recommending Blue Buffalo to friends and family. My girlfriend now uses the cat food for her little guy and he loves it too. Jack is a member of the family and I am happy to be providing him with such a fine quality food.
customer_reviews.author: The Lawn Wrangler

customer_reviews.title: dogs don’t like small balls Separate and throw away
customer_reviews.text: My dogs separated the small beaded things that are in the food they don’t seem to like those small beads this is about the fifth bag I’ve bought and I can’t get them to eat the darn little balls they’re all over my house and floor
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a sensitive stomach
customer_reviews.text: I started my puppy on Nutro when I brought him home, since that's what the breeders were feeding him. He always had issues with his tummy (Hershey Squirts), from his regular food and from treats intended for both human and dog. I switched him over to this food as he got older, and his stomach problems have all but disappeared. The mileage may vary with your dog, but it works great for me Note: I have a 22-month old miniature aussie.
customer_reviews.author: Alamist

customer_reviews.title: Same as small breed.
customer_reviews.text: I have two small Havanese dogs. Much cheaper to buy the adult small bite bags. You can’t find this size in the pet stores locally. They seem to enjoy the blue buffalo better than any other brand. The adult small bite is the same as small breed from my understanding so that saves you a good amount of money. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mikegezz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dog food
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was a little cheaper but other than that, it's a great product. It's one of the only dog foods that doesn't cause my chihuahua to have bad breath. I think it's because she has issues with digestion & dog food ingredients? It also keeps her from gaining weight which is a problem with small chihuahuas. I have used very expensive & gluten free, non GMO food for her & she still had bad breath. So idkw this product works for her but it's very good.
customer_reviews.author: Kkris13

customer_reviews.title: I would like reimbursed for this
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time buying this one and my dog has been sick, itching, diarrhea and lost of appetite. I would like reimbursed for this! I have bought the light blue one before and had no issues so I do have a bag of that. So I will try that one again and see if there is any issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We all love it (even though only Buddy eats it).
customer_reviews.text: Five stars means "I love it"... actually Budweiser the Golden Doodle loves it. He can't eat regular dog food with a lot of fiber, or he gets IBS. Not a good situation for any of us. He loves Blue Buffalo, and since he gets bored with the same food all the time he really likes the fact that we can keep three flavors in rotation. The vet recommended some prescription Iams at $80 a bag. Buddy hated the stuff, we hated the stuff. Then someone recommended Blue Buffalo and everybody's happy. Except the vet who's not selling $2.50 a pound dog food any more.
customer_reviews.author: Dale B.

customer_reviews.title: This Food is Making Dogs Sick!
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this from my usual Taste of the Wild Lamb and Rice. It's been a little over a month and I am noticing bald white spots on my dog's fur. I went online and found that several people are having the same issue as I am, and it is because of this EXACT brand and flavor. BEWARE. I am not one to believe what I read online, but it was the exact same food and the condition looks exactly like what my dog has. As soon as I read that I stopped feeding him the stuff and switched him back to TOTW. His coat has improved almost overnight. This is awful! This food is making dogs sick!
customer_reviews.author: RDW

customer_reviews.title: Ruby Approved
customer_reviews.text: Ruby used to eat Rachel Ray zero grain but my sister suggested I try this food. Apparently, Ruby ate more than her fair share while visiting her cousins. Sure enough. Ruby devours this stuff. I got the lamb variety. But because it’s so packed with protein and not fillers, Ruby only eats a small amount before she’s full. She has terrible gas because of the high protein content but since she loves the food, I’ve learned to tolerate it. So, yeah, it’s dog food and Ruby loves it. Not much more to say.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: My dog vomits each time I feed her this product. She eats everything else put in front of her except the salmon formula, so I was really surprised that this does not agree with her. Submitted in error !!! Wrong formula!!
customer_reviews.author: Liz L

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 11year dog almost had to be put on insulin due to this food. After a month on this food, he all of a sudden started wetting the bed and peeing without notice. He was chugging his water, then need to go out within moments later. We needed to go out every 2 hours. Our vet said it was his new food. I really wish I would have listened to the bad reviews. My dog is fine now. 🙏🏼
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: I can’t actually attest to the flavor. That’s an odd thing to ask about dog food. But my dog doesn’t seem to mind it. He always eats it. My dog has a nice shiny coat and a good build to him, so I know the ingredients are quality. This is the only dog food I buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sparks

customer_reviews.title: 1 year old dachshund loves it
customer_reviews.text: Our long haired dachshund loves this food, but i was disappointed that the 30lb bag was only $3 more than the 15lb bag. For such a small dog, I like to buy smaller bags so they stay fresh. Also, the 30lb bag did not have a zipper seal like the smaller bag does. So, half went into the 15lb food bin we have and the other half is sitting in an unsealed bag(we did put a clip on it) until it gets used up.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Gave our dog diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: We got this at the beginning of COVID-19 because we weren’t going to Costco to get our dogs normal dog food. From day one our dog had very runny poop. We figured it was because we didn’t let her gradually switch over, but after a month she still had runny poop. We ended up throwing away about half of the food and switching back to Costco brand. Immediately her poops became a solid again.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed I Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs have been eating this food for two years, and 2 months after diarrhea issues and looking at old reviews, we decided to try different food. No issues since a day after we switched. I had been buying this food from in store until six months ago with no problem. So it must be from the batch Amazon had or they are not rotating their stock properly. I doubt it's the brand. We pay for prime for the convience, and for the quality because we love our dogs so much. This was extremely disappointing and we'll either be buying food in store or online from a different source.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cuffman

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Food!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: we got a bag with a hole in it and let Amazon know. They handled and fixed the situation in such a timely manner!! I can't thank them enough. While it sounds bad, it makes life so much easier knowing, I wasn't going to have to rush to the pet store for dog food. Our dogs love this food. I have found that Amazon auto-ship and Chewy.com auto-ship are the cheapest ways to purchase this food. While it is not the cheapest dog food, it is completely worth the price for the quality of ingredients you are giving your furry children.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Miller

customer_reviews.title: Betsey says she loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Vet had us put our pooch on a diet. We don't overfeed her and I was hesitant to give her any less--this 55 lbs beast was eating the same amount as the 15 lbs schnauzer!! We teasingly call them her dust bunnies but Betsey loves them--begs in the cutest way possible for her dinner! Can't wait to see her healthy but we will miss her double butt!! Or maybe just the jokes about her double butt!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie L

customer_reviews.title: Dogs scarf it down
customer_reviews.text: I used to think this was too pricey for dog food but when you can order, have it delivered to your door and not pay shipping with Prime, and know what you are giving your beloved fur babies is better for them its 100% worth it. I will never use any other brand again. My dogs love their food and they seem healthier for it. Having senior dogs, we switched to this brand when they were 4 and 6 and now they are 11 and 13 and I truly believe the higher qualify food kept them healthy to be with us longer. Shiny coats as well :)
customer_reviews.author: Breanne Whiteman

customer_reviews.title: Why would they pack 30lbs of dog food with 2 lbs of coffee?!?!?!?!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 bags of coffee. However they stuffed a 30lbs bag of dog food in there too and my coffee look like they were one more drop away from exploding under the weight. Also no place to request to USPS NOT to leave my packages in the Sun leaning against my garbage can. On my porch, in the shade, watched by the doorbell camera is preferred. And the box was split open and spilled its contents, no way to pick it up as a closed box.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T

customer_reviews.title: Better than most brands I tried, but still not what I need.
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people recommended this to me for my pit bull and I used it for almost a year before deciding it just wasn't working. She liked it more than Nutro brand but she was still a little too thin and her skin/coat weren’t great. At the end of the day, it’s still just kibble and my dog needed something a little more.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Martin

customer_reviews.title: ... to this food (he normally eats the salmon and sweet potatoes and loves that) huge mistake because he keeps ...
customer_reviews.text: I switched my dog to this food (he normally eats the salmon and sweet potatoes and loves that) huge mistake because he keeps getting sick when he eats it :( I even mixed the old with new so his tummy wouldn't get upset. So think twice if you want to switch to this one like we did.
customer_reviews.author: angela ditmore

customer_reviews.title: Good middle of the road dogfood
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are pretty picky, so I was relieved to find a dogfood all of them would eat. It's neither the best quality, nor the worst, but a good middle of the road dogfood I can feel okay about feeding them. I purchase it using subscribe and save to save about $8-10 per bag. No stinky dog breath like what you find with the fish protein foods, and my dogs manage solid stools with this unlike with some other dry foods.
customer_reviews.author: messygirl

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as the products in store
customer_reviews.text: Listen to the negative reviews!!! I purchased this product wirhout giving it a second thought because it is the same brand I purchase in store. Well, the food I received from Amazon is NOT the same as the food I purchase in store. This product has made my dog throw up and has given her an allergic reaction: licking/biting at paws and skin and excessive scratching. I tossed the food and went back to PetSmart to purchase the food and my dog's skin has improved, her coat feels softer, and she has not thrown up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not agree with my black lab
customer_reviews.text: this food is not agreeing with my black lab. she is throwing up undigested kibble after eating and her stool is runny. When I switched her back to her previous brand of kibble these symptoms stopped.
customer_reviews.author: Chairman of the Board

customer_reviews.title: My dog doesn't hate it, and he's staying healthy eating it.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't taste it, so I'm not rating the flavor or freshness. My 9 year old dog can't talk, so he can't tell me his opinion either. But he eats it and he's healthy, he's been eating this stuff for several years now. I believe this to be some of the best quality dog food for the money based on what I've read. Sure there is better stuff, but you'll also pay more for it.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog was a little picky in what she ate. I wanted to stay with dry foods. I was surprised and pleased at how well she eats this. I did not do a slow taper/titrations but my mini-Aussie had no sign of digestive troubles. I think it is a little pricey but in the big scheme of the price of owning a dog, food cost is a relatively small item.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Bad or possibly molded food?!
customer_reviews.text: Hey hey we order this once a month and this particular bag was bad. Sorry for writing so late but I was out of town and my wife informed me our dog got pretty sick after eating from this particular bag. No clue as to why my wife did say it smelled different. Not complaint just fyi in case y’all have more from this particular vendor or lot. Anyhow have an awesome day.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Quality issues through amazon
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying this exact dog food from Amazon for over a year, no issues. Super convenient and my dog loves it! There is something wrong with the batches made/amazon storage recently (mine was delivered Aug 14). My dog had insanely watery diarrhea, went to the vet, after meds and a poop lab coming back fine he was still crapping his brains out like a waterfall. I am afraid to order this product through Amazon anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the dog likes it
customer_reviews.text: my wife says this is healthy for the dog, and the dog likes it. There you go. Good enough for 5 stars. But why ask ME about the flavor? God help me if I know the answer to that. Amazon should remove that question from the review. I mean, my dog eats cat poop in the yard and licks you-know-where, so flavor apparently doesn't matter to him either.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap, but reasonably priced for well rated food
customer_reviews.text: I regularly check dog food advisor sites for recalls, and see what they rate as good food based on the ingredients. Blue Buffalo is almost always in the top 10 and one of the few that has never had a recall. And among the best rated food, it is MUCH cheaper than the others. My dog is not picky about what she eats so can't say anything about the flavor
customer_reviews.author: Mikeindc

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reactions both dogs
customer_reviews.text: I bought to get rid of food allergy but, they got worse for both of my Rottweilers. Switched the one with bad allergies to Science diet and the other one that orginally had no allergies to rachel ray 6 ingredients and both are doing quit well and itching and licking are gone on one Rottweiler completely and the other just a bit of licking. Used the weight loss blue also, both dogs allergic reactions bad!!!@
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Means

customer_reviews.title: Better than the alternative
customer_reviews.text: This product is cheaper at my local Petco (by roughly $15 a bag!) I switched the dog food for my female border collie because she was getting a little bit overweight with regular blue buffalo wilderness. This seems to have helped. I feed her this once in the morning and then in the afternoon I give her a bowl of pumpkin and green beans.
customer_reviews.author: Tarpit

customer_reviews.title: Great food,  good ingredients
customer_reviews.text: My dog enjoys this food. She is typically a little picky. I feel good about the ingredients. It has simple ingredients without a bunch of fillers. It is produced USA. My dog also sometimes itches and I assume has allergies to some dog foods. She did not scratch and rub after eating this food. I believe it does not contain a popular allergen.
customer_reviews.author: KELSEY'SCORNER

customer_reviews.title: not blue buffalo
customer_reviews.text: This is not blue buffalo. Fed my 95 pound dog one serving and he was up all night pooping bloody loose/ watery stool.This is a dog that can easily put down a chocolate cake and have no side effects
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Easy on my dog's stomach!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only dog food I buy. One of my dogs has had a very sensitive stomach since she was a puppy and this is the only food I tried that did NOT upset it. I have been feeding my dogs this for over seven years and for almost that entire time I have been purchasing it off of Amazon. Delivery is ALWAYS on time and have NEVER received a damaged or ripped bag. The price is more than other brands of dog food, but I have found the adage "you get what you pay for" to be absolutely true and well worth its cost.
customer_reviews.author: kbtustin

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this Blue Buffalo for many years and dogs love it. However, I just discovered that Wal-Mart sells the same 30 pound bag for $31.00!!
customer_reviews.author: Guy A. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Cut bags, no damage to shipping box.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this dog food on my subscriptions for over a year now, and though I haven’t written a review on it before, I think this needs to be addressed. In that time, I have had maybe 2 bags come that weren’t cut, with dog food all over inside the shipping box. More often than not, there’s no damage to the outside box, just the bag itself. Being a more expensive dog food, it’s irritating to think of how much I’ve paid for and lost with this recurring issue.
customer_reviews.author: Anjuli Uran

product_meta.title: Blue Buffalo Life Protection Formula Natural Adult Dry Dog Food
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Lamb & Brown Rice Recipe| Size:15 lbFormulated for the health and well-being of dogs, BLUE Life Protection Formula Dry Dog Food is made with the finest natural ingredients enhanced with vitamins and minerals. It contains the ingredients you’ll love feeding as much as they’ll love eating. BLUE Life Protection Formula dog food is a product of the Blue Buffalo company. Based in the United States, Blue Buffalo makes premium-quality pet foods featuring real meat, fruit and vegetables.
feature_bullets: REAL MEAT FIRST: Blue Buffalo foods always feature real meat as the first ingredient. High-quality protein from real lamb helps your dog build and maintain healthy muscles. Plus they contain wholesome whole grains, garden veggies and fruit.

FOR ADULT DOGS: BLUE Life Protection Formula adult dog food contains essential proteins and carbohydrates to help meet the energy needs of adult dogs, and features omega 3 & 6 fatty acids to promote a shiny coat and healthy skin.

WITH LIFESOURCE BITS: This formula contains BLUE’s exclusive LifeSource Bits – a precise blend of antioxidants, vitamins and minerals carefully selected by holistic veterinarians and animal nutritionists, to support immune system health, life stage requirements, and a healthy oxidative balance.

A NATURAL DOG FOOD: BLUE dry dog food is made with the finest natural ingredients enhanced with vitamins and minerals. BLUE contains NO chicken (or poultry) by-product meals, corn, wheat, soy, artificial flavors or preservatives.
Contains one (1) 15 lb. Bag of BLUE Life Protection Formula Adult Dry Dog Food, Lamb and Brown Rice

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
